info.title: Application Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) Content Builder
info.description: Builds a MIME server report and it can be used to download an application file.

method.name: set
method.description: Prepares the file to be downloaded.

parameter.name: $fileName
parameter.description: The relative path of the file to be downloaded.

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: The type of the file. See HTTPResponse constants for a list of file types.

parameter.name: $mode
parameter.description: The file mode. See class constants for options. It is in account mode by default.

parameter.name: $shared
parameter.description: Whether to use the shared folder location or not. It is FALSE by default.

method.name: setFileContents
method.description: Prepares the file contents to be downloaded.

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: The type of the contents given. See HTTPResponse constants for a list of file types.
